core.name: LDAP All-For-One Manager
core.slogan: A web based LDAP Manager for everyone.
core.keywords: cloud hosting services, open source application, open source software, progressive web app, pwa
core.description: LDAP All-For-One Manager is a web based LDAP Manager for everyone. It (will) provide a user-friendly web application to manage LDAP account, reset password, explore the LDAP and much more.

confirmation.update-message: Are you sure you want to update?
confirmation.delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.

not-found.title: Are you lost?
not-found.subtitle: The page you were looking was not found or does not exist anymore.

error.title: Oops!
error.subtitle: It seems like something went wrong or you are unauthorized to do this. Try again later or contact us.

install.title: How to install
install.subtitle: Learn how to install this application on your device
install.description: This application is actually a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be directly installed to your device. Learn more about how to install this application on your device:

ios.title: Install on iOS
ios.description: To install a PWA on your Home Screen, follow these steps:

steps.home_screen: Tap the icon labeled 'Add to Home Screen'
steps.name: Confirm the name of the PWA then tap 'Add' in the upper-right corner
steps.launch: You can now launch the application from your Home Screen

android.title: Install on Android
android.description: Using Chrome for Android, you will automatically be prompted to install the app on your system. Click 'Install' to install the application on your device.

chrome.title: Install on Chrome (desktop)
chrome.description: When using Chrome for Desktop, you can click on the menu (the 3 dots in the upper-right corner), then 'Install ...' to add the application to Chrome Applications.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Fill in the form below to login to your account.

password-reset.title: Reset password
password-reset.sent: Further instructions for resetting your password have been sent to your email address

profile.description: Access you profile page and information
